Knowledge Gaps The assessment was based on counts of nests or individuals during the breeding season at two monitored breeding colonies within OSPAR region I.

Threats and Impacts Threats appear to be continuing or increasing in OSPAR region I. Climate change and environmental pollution remain serious threats. The threat from predators in the breeding colonies appear to increase.
